title: New Champion Suggest:
body:
Dragner,Monster of the mountains

Lore: Dragner was Born in the mountains,And he become the Monster of it,He kills every one put his foot on his land,There is a time when the second king of Demacia and his army moved on his land,He showed up and killed them all,for now no one can kill him.
-------------------------------
Heal: 545 (+90 per level)
Mana: 220 (+39 per level) 
Attack Damage: 56 (+3.2 per level)
Attack Speed: 0.655 (+2.85% per level)
Movement Speed: 345
health Regen: 6 (+0.8 per level)
Mana Regen: 5 (+0.4 per level)
Armor: 24 (+2.9 per level)
Magic Resist: 32.1 (+1.25 per level)
Attack range: 125
-------------------------------
Abilities:-

Passive You better Escape: If Dragner Hits an enemy with an ability,It Apples Death-stack that stacks on enemy for 4 seconds,If Dragner hits the enemy with basic attack 2 times,the third one will steal 10% movement speed from the enemy for 1.5 second.
While fire from:The movement speed steal becomes 20%.
-------------------------------
Q Fire Bolt: Dragner Fires a fire Bolt that hits the enemy dealing 65/105/145/180/225(+85% Ability Power)magic damage and steal 5%/10%/15%/20%/25% armor for 1.5 Second.
While fire from:will have 50% increased width and damage,can hit up to 3 enemies (armor steal just on the first enemy).
Range: 700
Mana: 60/70/80/90/100
Cooldown: 12/11.5/11/10.5/10
---------------------------
W Metal claws: Dragner turns his claws to metal and make them taller for 5 second,Gaining 8/16/24/32/40(+10% from bonus Attack Damage) attack damage and increase the attack range by 75.
While fire from:Gives bonus 25% Armor and attack range by 75
Mana: 50 at all ranks
Cooldown: 20/19/18/17/16
---------------------------
E Destructive Wind: Dragner uses his claws to strike the wind dealing 70/110/150/190/240(+80% from bonus Attack Damage)physical damage,It deals 30% additional damage to enemies front of him.
While fire from:50% increased range and deal the 30% additional damage to all the area.
Range:200
Width:400
Mana: 55/65/75/85/95
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
---------------------------
Ult R Self Fire:after 1.25 second Dragner body turns fire then he flies in sky becoming untargetable for 3 second,He can target a great distance away to come crashing down in the area,dealing 150/250/350(+75% Attack damage)(+50%Ability Power)physical damage,He Stays in fire form for 7 seconds and his abilities gain additional effect.
Range:1000/1500/2000
Area of damage:400
Mana: 100/150/200
Cooldown: 140/130/120
--------------------------
He is a big dragon,He have Sharp claws and long tail,He is Black from behind and gray from the front,he have a red Jewel on his chase.
I think that this will be a nice champion to make,It's just a suggest so don't look at names and numbers.
